name: You Rock My World
wikiSummary: "You Rock My World" is a song by singer/songwriter Michael Jackson. It was the debut single from Jackson's 2001 album Invincible. The song peaked at #10 on the U.S. Hot 100. The song was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance in the 2002 Grammy Awards.  Michael Jackson and Rodney Jerkins played all the instruments in the song, which was recorded at Record One studios in Los Angeles it was recorded in July-September in 2000.
wikiText:
"You Rock My World" is a song by singer/songwriter Michael Jackson. It was the debut single from Jackson's 2001 album Invincible. The song peaked at #10 on the U.S. Hot 100. The song was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance in the 2002 Grammy Awards.
 
 Michael Jackson and Rodney Jerkins played all the instruments in the song, which was recorded at Record One studios in Los Angeles it was recorded in July-September in 2000.
